changes_made: Implemented Enter and Space key support for interactive cards
Updated Card component to support keyboard navigation
Added semantic HTML role='button' for interactive cards
Added tabIndex={0} to make interactive cards keyboard-focusable
Improved hoverable state logic to default to true for interactive cards

patterns_discovered.description: Created a reusable keyboard event handler that responds to Enter and Space keys for accessibility
patterns_discovered.relevance: Core pattern for making card components keyboard-accessible

patterns_discovered.description: Dynamically assigns semantic HTML roles (button) based on whether component has onClick handler
patterns_discovered.relevance: Ensures proper accessibility semantics only when needed

patterns_discovered.description: Interactive cards automatically enable hoverable styling unless explicitly disabled
patterns_discovered.relevance: Improves UX consistency without requiring prop duplication

patterns_discovered.description: Keyboard handler checks for onClick existence before processing events
patterns_discovered.relevance: Prevents errors when keyboard handlers are attached to non-interactive cards

gotchas_discovered.description: Code uses event.key (modern approach) rather than keyCode - checks for literal 'Enter' string and Space character
gotchas_discovered.impact: more reliable across different keyboard layouts and languages

gotchas_discovered.description: preventDefault() is called to prevent default browser behavior when Space or Enter triggers onClick
gotchas_discovered.impact: Prevents unwanted scrolling or form submission when Space is pressed

gotchas_discovered.description: Default value for hoverable changed from false to undefined, with new conditional logic
gotchas_discovered.impact: Breaking change if external code relied on hoverable={false} default behavior
gotchas_discovered.handling: Smart logic ensures backwards compatibility through effectiveHoverable variable

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully implemented keyboard accessibility features for the Card component
key_achievements: Added Enter/Space key support for interactive cards
Implemented proper semantic HTML with role and tabIndex
Improved hoverable state logic for better UX

recommendations.recommendation: Add unit tests for handleKeyDown function with various key inputs (Enter, Space, other keys)
recommendations.rationale: Keyboard accessibility is critical and should be tested programmatically

recommendations.recommendation: Document the new keyboard accessibility feature in component JSDoc comments
recommendations.rationale: Developers using Card component should know about keyboard interaction support

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding visual focus indicator styling to make keyboard navigation more obvious
recommendations.rationale: Users relying on keyboard navigation need clear visual feedback on focused elements

recommendations.recommendation: Verify that existing Card usage doesn't break with the hoverable prop logic changes
recommendations.rationale: Changes to default prop behavior could affect existing component instances

recommendations.recommendation: Test with screen readers to ensure role='button' provides proper accessibility announcements
recommendations.rationale: Semantic HTML alone doesn't guarantee screen reader compatibility without testing
